data.name: International Cash Management Account
data.description: The International Cash Management Account is a At-Call account offering catering for HSBC's foreign currency account offering.

features.additionalValue: Access via HSBCnet to view and transact on the account.

fees.name: Fee per transaction on the account
Cheque clearing charges per item (AUD account only)
Inward Transfers - International Telegraphic Transfer (TT) receipt
Inward Transfers - Local RTGS receipt
Inward Transfers - Foreign currency cheques and drafts sent for collection
Inward Transfers - Foreign currency cheques and drafts purchased
fees.additionalInfo: Plus costs

fees.name: Inward Transfers - Dishonour of foreign currency cheques
fees.additionalInfo: Costs from overseas banks will be passed on

fees.name: Transfers Between Accounts - Domestic Funds transfers between accounts with HSBC via HSBCnet
Outward Transfers - Overnight domestic funds transfers using ACH or autoPay via HSBCnet
Outward Transfers - Domestic Telegraphic Transfers also known as Local RTGS [see info]
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic Telegraphic Transfers also known as Local RTGS or Priority Payments initiated via HSBCnet

fees.name: Outward Transfers - International Telegraphic Transfers also known as Priority Payments [see info]
fees.additionalInfo: International Telegraphic Transfers also known as Priority Payments initiated via HSBCnet

fees.name: Outward Transfers - Payments instructed via fax or in hard copy on original HSBC application form
fees.additionalInfo: plus applicable TT fee

fees.name: Outward Transfers - Telegraphic Transfer initiated via other form of instructions [see info]
fees.additionalInfo: Telegraphic Transfer initiated via other form of instructions (as agreed to by HSBC)

fees.name: Outward Transfers - OUR Fee charge [see info]
fees.additionalInfo: Plus applicable TT fee. Note: This fee is where you instruct HSBC to submit a payment with a request that all fees and charges applied by intermediary and receiving banks for their role in processing the payment, be charged to you rather than to the beneficiary, a flat fee applies.

fees.name: Outward Transfers - Referral fee for authorisation of payment
fees.additionalInfo: Referral fee for authorisation of payment where the account has insufficient and/or unclear funds and no prior arrangements have been made

fees.name: Outward Transfers - Payment tracing fee(per trace or follow up)
Outward Transfers - Amendment/Cancellation/Return of remitted payment
fees.additionalInfo: Plus other bank’s charges

fees.name: Manual Standing Instructions - To an HSBC account
Manual Standing Instructions - To an account at another domestic bank
Manual Standing Instructions - Other Payments
fees.additionalInfo: Cost of Bank Cheque also applies

fees.name: Manual Standing Instructions - Non-payment due to lack of funds
Direct Debit Request - Direct Debit set up
Direct Debit Request - Transaction Fee
Direct Debit Request - Return Fee per item
Direct Debit Request - Trace Request (per request)
Direct Credits - Fee per credit transaction
Direct Credits - Returned transactions (per item)
Direct Credits - Payment tracing (per trace)
Direct Debits - Dishonour / rejection fee
Foreign Currency Notes - Bank buys and pays AUD
fees.additionalInfo: The applicable exchange rate is the Bank’s Note buying rate for that currency against AUD.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Notes - Bank sells and receives AUD
fees.additionalInfo: The applicable exchange rate is the Bank’s Note selling rate for that currency against AUD.

fees.name: BPay® payments - Per BPay® payment
Cheque Fees - Stop payment request
Cheque Fees - Dishonours - cheques drawn by you
Cheque Fees - Dishonours - cheques deposited by you
fees.additionalInfo: plus other bank charges

fees.name: Cheque Fees - Bank cheque - Request initiated via HSBCnet
fees.additionalInfo: plus post/courier costs

fees.name: Cheque Fees - Bank cheque - Other requests
Cheque Fees - Bank cheque - Replacement of lost or stolen Bank cheque
Cheque Fees - Bank cheque - Repurchase Bank cheque
Cash Handling Fees - Local currency - [See info]
fees.additionalInfo: for amounts up to $1,000.00: $2.00; for amounts greater than $1,000.00: $2.00 + 0.50% of amount handled

fees.name: Cash Handling Fees - Foreign currency - [See info]
fees.additionalInfo: $2.00 +1.25% of amount handled (min $20.00). On all cash withdrawals from, or deposits to, a foreign currency account

fees.name: Transactions through an alliance bank branch - Deposits - cheques
fees.additionalInfo: $6.00 per deposit plus $0.65 per cheque

fees.name: Transactions through an alliance bank branch - Deposits - cash
fees.additionalInfo: $6.00 per deposit plus 0.85% of amount

fees.name: Transactions through an alliance bank branch - Cheque cashing
fees.additionalInfo: 1.5% of amount. Min $10.00.

fees.name: Cheque encashment facility set-up
fees.additionalInfo: per set-up (per branch)

fees.name: Cheque encashment facility amendment
fees.additionalInfo: per amendment (per branch)

fees.name: Real Time Payments
Real Time Payments to accounts within HSBC Australia
Returned Real Time Payments
Real Time Payment Receipts
Paper Billing Invoices

depositRates.additionalInfo: greater than 99,999.99 . Rates applicable to USD deposits
